backend/main.mo: Defines actor with mixin-based storage and authorization plus data modules for profiles, posts, messages, stories, reels, tracks, and chat messages including timestamp-based sorting helpers.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short text summaries for numerous frontend files including pages, hooks, layout components, and games.
frontend/ANDROID_APK.md: Guide explaining prerequisites and steps for building an Android APK using Capacitor.
frontend/android/.gitignore: Gitignore rules for Android build artifacts, IDE files, logs, and keystore files.
frontend/capacitor.config.ts: Capacitor configuration defining app metadata, build directory, server options, and Android build settings.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styling with light and dark theme CSS variables and global background/foreground rules.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with meta tags, icons, manifest, fonts, and root mount node.
frontend/public/downloads/.gitkeep: Empty placeholder file to preserve the downloads directory.
frontend/public/downloads/caffeine-socia: Bundled Android APK file for app installation.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest specifying app metadata, theme, icons, categories, and start URL.
frontend/src/ai/chatbotRules.ts: Defines navigation-aware chatbot logic that parses user input and triggers route changes or canned responses.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app entry handling authentication gating, routing setup, theme provider, and layout rendering.
frontend/src/components/ai/AiWritingTool: Provides a text transformation UI that applies selectable tone changes and supports copying or downloading results.
frontend/src/components/ai/ImageGenerato: Generates abstract images on a canvas using hue and complexity sliders and allows exporting as PNG.
Implements a local chat UI that sends user input to chatbotRespond and displays the conversation thread.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Renders the app header with logo, user profile info, and logout handling using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main application layout including header, navigation, main content outlet, and bottom tab bar.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppNaviga: Displays the desktop sidebar navigation highlighting the active route using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/layout/BottomTab: Provides the mobile bottom navigation bar with route-aware highlighting.
frontend/src/components/layout/Functiona: Shows a horizontal button bar for quick navigation to tools like whiteboard and AI features.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostCard.t: Renders a post with author info, timestamp, content, optional image, and delete functionality for owners.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Provides a modal form for creating or updating a user profile with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/startup/AppInitG: Controls startup flow by loading actor and user profile, handling timeouts and errors, and showing loading or profile setup states.
frontend/src/components/startup/StartupE: Displays an error screen with retry logic and optional technical details during app initialization failures.
frontend/src/components/startup/useStart: Provides a retry function that invalidates and refetches all React Query queries.
frontend/src/components/study/SlidesTool: Implements a simple slide editor and presenter with adding, deleting, reordering, and presentation mode.
frontend/src/components/study/Whiteboard: Canvas-based drawing tool with colors, eraser, clear, and PNG export functionality.
frontend/src/docs/nonGoals.md: Documents features explicitly not implemented, especially screenshot blocking due to browser limitations.
frontend/src/games/2048/Game2048.tsx: Functional 2048 game including tile movement, merging, scoring, and reset.
frontend/src/games/memory-match/MemoryMa: Emoji-based memory matching game tracking flipped, matched cards, and move count.
frontend/src/games/quiz/Quiz.tsx: Multiple-choice quiz with scoring, progress tracking, and final results screen.
frontend/src/games/snake/Snake.tsx: Implements a Snake game with movement, collision, scoring, and keyboard controls using React state and intervals.
frontend/src/games/tic-tac-toe/TicTacToe: Provides a basic Tic-Tac-Toe game with winner detection, turn handling, and a reset function.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useChat.ts: React Query hooks for fetching messages and sending chat messages through an actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCurrentUse: Hooks to load and save the current user's profile via actor calls with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useNotificati: Hooks for entering notification rooms, fetching entries, adding notifications, and admin actions like ban/unban.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/usePosts.ts: Hooks to fetch, create, and delete posts with automatic query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/usePrivateRoo: Hooks for creating, entering, and messaging in private chat rooms through actor mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useReels.ts: Hooks to fetch, create, and delete video reels using actor API and React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useStories.ts: Hooks for loading active stories and creating or deleting stories with query refresh.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useUserSearch: Searches usernames via actor API with query enabled only when text is provided.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useUserTracks: Hooks for fetching and uploading user audio tracks using identity and actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an actor instance tied to user identity, invalidating dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, state, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, CSS variables for light and dark themes, and mobile-safe layout adjustments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, then renders App.
frontend/src/music/library.ts: Exports a Track interface and a small demo music library with sample audio entries.
frontend/src/pages/AiToolsPage.tsx: Renders tabbed AI tools page switching between writing, image generation, and chatbot components.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Implements messaging UI including direct chat, notifications room, admin tools, and private chat rooms.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Displays posts feed and form to create new posts with optional image upload and progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/GamesPage.tsx: Provides a tabbed interface to play multiple games including Tic-Tac-Toe, Memory, Snake, 2048, and Quiz.
frontend/src/pages/LoginScreen.tsx: Shows login screen with Internet Identity sign-in and an option to download the Android APK.
frontend/src/pages/MusicPage.tsx: Music player page with track filtering, playback controls, and user audio upload with progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/ReelsPage.tsx: Page for creating and listing video reels with optional links and owner‑verified deletion.
frontend/src/pages/SearchPage.tsx: User search interface that fetches matching usernames and allows starting a chat with a selected user.
frontend/src/pages/StoriesPage.tsx: Story creation and listing page supporting text, optional images, and owner‑verified deletion.
frontend/src/pages/StudyToolsPage.tsx: Page providing tabbed access to a whiteboard and slide viewer study tools.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for styling the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current requirements, features, issues, and architectural notes for building a mobile-style social app with persistent media and chats.
